short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the colors on the NYTimes Connection puzzle more intuitive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the colors used on the NYTimes Connections puzzle more intuitive. It changes them from Yellow -> Green -> Blue -> Purple to shades of blue (lighter = easier, darker = harder).
